articles.title: It's a dangerous complication of pregnancy — but a new drug holds promise - NPR
articles.description: Researchers celebrate early results of a drug that may become the first treatment for a serious complication of pregnancy called preeclampsia. It's got the potential to save many lives.
articles.content:
It was the fall of 2024 when Abigail Hendricks learned she was pregnant with her fifth child. She was glowing with excitement.

articles.title: ChatGPT promised to help her find her soulmate. Then it betrayed her - NPR
articles.description: ChatGPT sent screenwriter Micky Small down a fantastical rabbit hole. Now, she's finding her way out.
